name: Monster Incremental
description:
Click icons that have a matching icon on any side to collect that resource, combos more than 7 or 12 earn double or triple that resource. 

Build buildings to auto generate resources, assign monsters to jobs at those buildings to earn more of that resource, but make sure the monsters have enough food to not starve and leave your village. Research more buildings or upgrades to the buildings, and earn prestige points to restart from the beginning but earn things faster.
